Post Office.english: 1. I need to buy some stamps.
Post Office.italian: Ho bisogno di comprare dei francobolli.
Post Office.german: Ich muss Briefmarken kaufen.

Post Office.english: 2. Can I send this package internationally?
Post Office.italian: Posso inviare questo pacco all'estero?
Post Office.german: Kann ich dieses Paket international verschicken?

Post Office.english: 3. What are the postage rates for letters?
Post Office.italian: Quali sono le tariffe postali per le lettere?
Post Office.spanish: ¿Cuáles son las tarifas postales para las cartas?
Post Office.german: Was sind die Briefporto-Sätze?

Post Office.english: 4. I need to change my mailing address.
Post Office.italian: Devo cambiare il mio indirizzo di spedizione.
Post Office.spanish: Necesito cambiar mi dirección de envío.
Post Office.german: Ich muss meine Versandadresse ändern.

Post Office.english: 5. Can I track my package online?
Post Office.italian: Posso tracciare il mio pacco online?
Post Office.german: Kann ich mein Paket online verfolgen?

Post Office.english: 6. Is there a post office nearby?
Post Office.italian: C'è un ufficio postale nelle vicinanze?
Post Office.german: Gibt es eine Post in der Nähe?

Post Office.english: 7. How much does it cost to send a postcard?
Post Office.italian: Quanto costa inviare una cartolina?
Post Office.german: Wie viel kostet es, eine Postkarte zu versenden?

Post Office.english: 8. Do you have any envelopes?
Post Office.italian: Hai delle buste?
Post Office.german: Hast du Briefumschläge?

Post Office.english: 9. I need to register this letter.
Post Office.italian: Devo registrare questa lettera.
Post Office.german: Ich muss diesen Brief einschreiben.

Post Office.english: 10. What are the office hours?
Post Office.italian: Quali sono gli orari di apertura?
Post Office.german: Was sind die Öffnungszeiten?

Post Office.english: 11. Can I buy packaging materials here?
Post Office.italian: Posso comprare materiali per l'imballaggio qui?
Post Office.german: Kann ich hier Verpackungsmaterial kaufen?

Post Office.english: 12. I would like to send this via express mail.
Post Office.italian: Vorrei inviare questo tramite posta prioritaria.
Post Office.spanish: Me gustaría enviar esto por correo exprés.
Post Office.german: Ich möchte dies per Expresspost versenden.

Post Office.english: 13. Where can I find the nearest post office box?
Post Office.italian: Dove posso trovare la cassetta delle lettere più vicina?
Post Office.spanish: ¿Dónde puedo encontrar el buzón de correos más cercano?
Post Office.german: Wo finde ich den nächsten Briefkasten?

Post Office.english: 14. Can I buy international reply coupons here?
Post Office.italian: Posso comprare buoni di risposta internazionali qui?
Post Office.spanish: ¿Puedo comprar cupones de respuesta internacional aquí?
Post Office.german: Kann ich hier internationale Antwortscheine kaufen?

Post Office.english: 15. I need to send this letter by registered mail.
Post Office.italian: Devo inviare questa lettera con raccomandata.
Post Office.spanish: Necesito enviar esta carta por correo certificado.
Post Office.german: Ich muss diesen Brief per Einschreiben versenden.

Post Office.english: 16. Do you offer any shipping insurance?
Post Office.italian: Offrite qualche assicurazione di spedizione?
Post Office.german: Bieten Sie eine Versandversicherung an?

Post Office.english: 17. Can I pay for this with a credit card?
Post Office.italian: Posso pagare con una carta di credito?
Post Office.spanish: ¿Puedo pagar esto con tarjeta de crédito?
Post Office.german: Kann ich das mit einer Kreditkarte bezahlen?

Post Office.english: 18. I need to send this package overnight.
Post Office.italian: Devo spedire questo pacco entro domani.
Post Office.spanish: Necesito enviar este paquete durante la noche.
Post Office.german: Ich muss dieses Paket über Nacht versenden.

Post Office.english: 19. Where can I find the customs declaration forms?
Post Office.italian: Dove posso trovare i moduli di dichiarazione doganale?
Post Office.spanish: ¿Dónde puedo encontrar los formularios de declaración aduanera?
Post Office.german: Wo finde ich die Zollerklärungsformulare?

Post Office.english: 20. Can I purchase postage online?
Post Office.italian: Posso acquistare francobolli online?
Post Office.german: Kann ich Porto online kaufen?
